name: ScrollView
desc: A widget that combines a [Scrollable] and a [Viewport] to create an interactive scrolling pane of content in one dimension.

fields.name: scrollDirection
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.scroll_view.scrollDirection} The [Axis] along which the scroll view's offset increases.

fields.name: reverse
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.scroll_view.reverse} Whether the scroll view scrolls in the reading direction.

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.scroll_view.controller} An object that can be used to control the position to which this scroll view is scrolled.

fields.name: primary
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.scroll_view.primary} Whether this is the primary scroll view associated with the parent [PrimaryScrollController].

fields.name: physics
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.scroll_view.physics} How the scroll view should respond to user input.

fields.name: shrinkWrap
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.scroll_view.shrinkWrap} Whether the extent of the scroll view in the [scrollDirection] should be determined by the contents being viewed.

fields.name: center
fields.desc: The first child in the [GrowthDirection.forward] growth direction.

fields.name: anchor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.scroll_view.anchor} The relative position of the zero scroll offset.

fields.name: semanticChildCount
fields.desc: The number of children that will contribute semantic information.

fields.name: keyboardDismissBehavior
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.scroll_view.keyboardDismissBehavior} The [ScrollViewKeyboardDismissBehavior] defines how this [ScrollView] will dismiss the keyboard automatically. {@endtemplate}
